1.Pros: I love working at mcdonalds i love getting to know your regular customers.
1.Cons: I just dont like how people abuse their power at work.

2.Pros: Work/Life Balance and Great Work Culture to work with.
2.Cons: Management is not clear on direction

4.Pros: It has great co-workers and is a all out great place to work.
4.Cons: It gets tuff on somedays and sometimes the people you work with are not always friendly

5.Pros: There's not many pros to list

6.Pros: The only reason anyone would work at that location is to further their social agenda.
6.Cons: Was like being in high school all over again... very unprofessional!

7.Pros: McDonalds offers scholarships and tuition assistance for all employees. I was able to complete my under grad with very little out of my own pocket.
7.Cons: It's a high demand role and 100% varies with who you work under. I have fantastic experiences and horrible ones depending on who I was working under.

8.Pros: Good company to work for, loved the customers
8.Cons: Pay could be betterRude customers here and there

9.Pros: You learn a lot about management and you get to learn more about yourself and how you can become a better leader.
9.Cons: At my location there is not enough pay, especially for someone that is full time and a manager
